thread.title: Sports Wrap: Virat Kohli creates history, Joe Root is England captain
thread.title_full: Sports Wrap: Virat Kohli creates history, Joe Root is England captain

title: Sports Wrap: Virat Kohli creates history, Joe Root is England captain
text:
Feedback 
India crushed Bangladesh by 208 runs to win the one-off Test at Hyderabad. Set an improbable victory target of 459, Bangladesh were dismissed for 250 with the India spin duo of Ravindra Jadeja and Ravichandran Ashwin picking up four wickets apiece. Virat Kohli became the first batsman in the history to slam a double ton in four successive series. Joe Root has been named England's Test captain following Alastair Cook's decision to step down from the coveted post. Moving on to some other sports stories. In the first leg of the last-16 matches of the Champions League, PSG thrashed Barcelona 4-0 while Bayern Munich mauled Arsenal 5-1. And, Usain Bolt was named Laureus 'Sportsman of the Year' while gymnast Simone Biles clinched the top honour in the women's category. Watch Right Now 1 of 7 ‚ùØ
